title: Mini-Ep 96: Gray Hair and Good Books
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 96: Gray Hair and Good Books
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree hear from listeners about their purpose in life, how to deal with running into your ex, and varying feelings about gray hair. Plus, they share some book reccs, from Doree’s cozy-mysteries picks to Kate’s swoon-worthy romance reads.To ...
description:
Kate and Doree hear from listeners about their purpose in life, how to deal with running into your ex, and varying feelings about gray hair. Plus, they share some book reccs, from Doree’s cozy-mysteries picks to Kate’s swoon-worthy romance reads.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


Follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


Theme music by Riot.


This episode is sponsored by:

ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
